title: Why We Get Mad: When Anger Inspires Art
itunes:author: UW-Green Bay Psychology Department
itunes:summary:
Part three of our special series on anger includes an interview with Alison Gates, professor of art at the University of Wisconsin-Green Bay. Alison and Ryan discuss all the ways anger can inspire the creation of meaningful and powerful art.

Why We Get Mad is a special series of the Psychology and Stuff Podcast where Ryan talks with experts on different aspects of the anger experience. From psychologists to historians to artists, the show will cover all the different reasons we get mad and how we can use that anger in positive ways.
